STATUS.md.summary: All 6 milestones done. 74/74 tests. Next: T-001 cancellation, T-002 timeouts.

NEXT_ACTIONS.md.summary: 2 tasks ready. T-001: cancel endpoint. T-002: task timeouts + reaper.

TRUST.md.summary: Core features verified by tests. Docker and multi-instance SSE not integration-tested.

CONVENTIONS.md.summary: TS strict, MIT-only deps, node:test runner, JWT via built-in crypto, inject for tests.

WORKFLOW.md.summary: contracts -> persistence -> redis-adapter -> route -> tests. AAHP update checklist included.

quick_context: OpenClaw EdgeMesh control plane is complete across all 6 milestones (DLQ, Redis, JWT, scheduling, metrics/Docker, SSE). 74/74 tests pass, build clean, all pushed to Jerrycyborg/Claw-Edgemesh. Next: implement task cancellation (T-001) then task timeouts with a background reaper (T-002).
